What is (are) Parasites - Zoonotic Hookworm ?,"There are many different species of hookworms, some are human parasites and some are animal parasites. People can be infected by larvae of animal hookworms, usually dog and cat hookworms. The most common result of animal hookworm infection is a skin condition called cutaneous larva migrans.",CDC,Parasites - Zoo
